column1: Wilibald was the son of [[Theobald Bolger]] and [[Nina Lightfoot]]. He married [[Prisca Baggins]], and had three children, [[Wilimar Bolger

column2: Wilibald]]'' contains ''wilja'' "wish, desire" and ''bald'' "bold".<ref>[[Jim Allan]], ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
